tagline: We craft marketing strategies that grow your revenue
description: Galway AI SEO is a full-service digital agency based in Galway, Ireland, specializing in SEO, web design, digital marketing, and AI-powered solutions. Founded in 2016, we're craftspeople in a digital sense, with a mission to drive authenticity into every project. Our 'Organic First' approach focuses on building solid foundations, increasing sales conversions, and driving high-intent traffic to help businesses achieve sustainable growth.
uniqueSellingPoints: Organic First approach - focusing on sustainable, long-term growth
AI-powered SEO solutions through proprietary technology (seogrove.ai)
Dedicated Project Manager for every account
Environmental commitment - 1 tree planted every day for each client (via onetreeplanted.org)
Authenticity and transparency as core values
Support available via multiple platforms (WhatsApp, email, phone)
Work with diverse clients from Ireland and globally
Results-driven: proven case studies showing 44% revenue increase, 237% traffic growth

testimonials.text: SEO and digital marketing does not happen overnight. For me I can tell you working with Hamish Davison has been an absolutely great investment into my SEO and online success.
testimonials.author: Client Review

testimonials.text: Worked with a few SEO companies over the years and spent a long time trying to get onto page 1 for a bunch of terms. Within 4 months we were position 6 for our main keyword which was great. More climbing too, highly recommend
testimonials.author: Client Review

testimonials.text: Thanks lads for the great work on our site. Gone from strength to strength and delighted with it. Recommend to anyone.
testimonials.author: Client Review

testimonials.text: Man I finally found a agency that does what they say they are going to do. I have a team that prioritizes the success of their clients business. I am excited to see what every month will bring moving forward.
testimonials.author: Client Review

testimonials.text: I have nothing but positive things to say about Galway AI SEO. Unlike so many other agencies in this space, they never overpromise and then underdeliver. Kraft delivers quality SEO services at a fair price. Kraft's backlinking services continue to increase our organic rankings across the board. Very pleased with the results.
testimonials.author: Client Review

testimonials.text: Professional and responsive company with good support and a friendly team. We used them to develop a new website and SEO.
testimonials.author: Client Review

testimonials.text: Finding a good marketing company is always tough - especially when it's inbound marketing as it takes longer for results to appear. That being said, these guys dont just do run of the mill bs, they know how to get ahead. A good long term partner for all that is digital marketing.
testimonials.author: Client Review

testimonials.text: The Kraft team are very professional, with a quick turnaround on results. The lads were always just a message away, for any questions. Highly recommend
testimonials.author: Client Review

testimonials.text: I have had a great working experience here at Kraft. The Owner Rowan is courteous and professional. There is a great work-life balance due to a hybrid working model.
testimonials.author: Employee Review

reviews.overallSentiment: Mixed - mostly positive reviews highlighting results and professionalism, with some negative reviews regarding communication and service quality. Recent positive reviews show strong client satisfaction.
positiveHighlights: Results-driven approach with measurable SEO improvements

caseStudies.result: Creating The Platform That Powers Jameson With Renewable Energy
Developing The Identity For Green Saffron. Now In Tesco & SuperValu.

clientsOrProjects: Clients across Ireland, UK, America, and globally

process.title: Build a solid foundation
process.description: Without a solid foundation your entire marketing strategy will be impacted negatively. We always start here - getting your technical metrics into the green and ensuring Google sees your website optimally.

process.title: Increase sales conversions
process.description: Conversion Rate Optimization is one of the most important activities. It's about maximizing the chance to convert before spending a cent driving traffic - bolting on powerful features to drive conversions.

process.title: Drive buyer intent traffic
process.description: Time to build relevancy with content. Create trust with a strong backlink portfolio and aggressively scale organic visitors. With your website ready to convert, we drive high-intent prospects with helpful content and targeted offers.

values: Authenticity - the cornerstone of our agency, breathing integrity and quality into our services
ROI Focus - understanding that return on investment is pivotal to our engagement
Quality Craftsmanship - taking craftsmanship seriously with robust QA processes
Environmental Responsibility - planting 1 tree per day for each client via onetreeplanted.org
Client Success - results-driven approach prioritizing client business growth
Transparency - honest communication and realistic expectations
Accessibility - support available on platforms clients use every day
companyHistory: Galway AI SEO was founded in 2016 in Galway, Ireland, with a vision to provide authentic, results-driven digital marketing services. The name 'Kraft' reflects the team's commitment to craftsmanship in the digital realm. Starting as a web design and SEO agency, Kraft has evolved into a full-service digital marketing agency with AI-powered solutions. The agency has grown from a small team to 20+ international specialists, serving clients across Ireland and globally. Their focus has always been on driving real results - not just providing services - with an 'Organic First' philosophy that prioritizes sustainable, long-term growth over short-term gains. The team works with diverse clients from small businesses to major brands like Jameson and Green Saffron.

contactInfo.availability: Support available via WhatsApp, email, and phone

researchNotes: Comprehensive information gathered from multiple sources including official website (kraftdigitalagency.com), LinkedIn, Facebook, Trustpilot reviews, and business directories. The company has strong case studies showing measurable results (44% revenue increase, 237.5% traffic growth). The team is well-documented with 20+ members. Reviews are mixed (3.6/5 on Trustpilot with 11 reviews) but recent reviews are more positive. The company has evolved significantly since 2016, now offering AI-powered solutions and working with major brands. Their 'Organic First' philosophy and commitment to authenticity are central to their brand identity. Office is confirmed in Galway, Ireland. Contact information verified from multiple sources.
